Class LifeSupport

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.component.Component
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.component.LifeSupport
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class LifeSupport extends Component
Represents a life support component, extending the Component class.

    • getLabel

      public String getLabel()
      Retrieves the label associated with the component. This label is a short string identifier used to represent the specific type of component.
      Specified by:
      getLabel in class Component
      Returns:
      the label of the component as a string

    • getMainAttribute

      public String getMainAttribute()
      Retrieves a string representation of the main attribute for the life support component. The main attribute is determined based on the color of the life support system: - "P" for PURPLE. - "B" for BROWN.
      Specified by:
      getMainAttribute in class Component
      Returns:
      a string representing the main attribute of the life support component
